mapper.insert: insert into part_category (category_id, category_code, category_name, parent_id, level, sort_order, is_active, created_time) values (#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{sortOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isActive,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update part_category set category_code = #{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select category_id, category_code, category_name, parent_id, level, sort_order, is_active, created_time from part_category where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select category_id, category_code, category_name, parent_id, level, sort_order, is_active, created_time from part_category
